snippet: The suspects are also thought to belong to the extremist Islamic group Ansarullah Bangla Team.
abstract: Bangladesh police arrest Masud Rana and Saad al-Nahin in Dhaka for murder of Niladri Chaterjee, activist whose social media posts criticized Islam; suspects, who already face attempted murder charges for attack on another blogger, Asif Mohiuddin, are believed to be members of Ansarullah Bangla Team, Islamic extremist group.
lead_paragraph: The suspects are also thought to belong to the extremist Islamic group Ansarullah Bangla Team.

headline.main: 2 Arrested in Killing of Secular Blogger in Bangladesh
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: 2 Held in Blogger’s Killing
